question: Match the following with their pKa values:
| Acid | pKa |
| (I) Phenol | (a) 16 |
| (II) p-Nitrophenol | (b) 0.78 |
| (III) Ethyl alcohol | (c) 10 |
| (IV) Picric acid | (d) 7.1 |
explanation: Acidity order: Picric acid > p-Nitrophenol > Phenol > Ethanol.
pKa order: Picric acid (lowest) < p-Nitrophenol < Phenol < Ethanol (highest).
Matches: Phenol (10), p-Nitrophenol (7.1), Ethanol (16), Picric acid (0.78).
